sub_title: FS Business Consulting | Business Development | Market-Entries | Digital Transformation | Fintech & Cloud | Investing
summary:
Business development professional, management consultant and project manager in the financial services industry.

Constantly interested in innovation, new challenges and achieving best in class performance with his team. 

Strong analytical skills and direct and fair business manager, sees honesty, trust  and openess as key for a succesfull team effort.

- Accelerates in green field and complex environments
- End-user and customer centric focussed
- Innovation and top-line growth 
- From strategy till and including delivery
- Market scans and entries in several European countries
- Digital Strategy / Multi Channel

Making things happen and getting delivered.


Example achievements:
- Spokesperson for Capgemini’s World Wealth Report 2004-2011
- Initiator transparency index for investment funds (transparantiebarometer)
- Winner Capgemini Delivery award 2009 and nominee Publicity Award 2009


Client project reference snaphot:
- Rabobank International
- ING Investment Banking (Worldwide migration manager )
- UBS
- ABN AMRO Private Banking, New Growth Markets & Moneyou
- Merrill Lynch
- SNS Reaal
- Banka Slovenia (central bank of Slovenia)

Specialties: Ecommerce, Business Development, Internet, Mobile, IT Development, App Development, Market Entries, Innovation, Project Management, Private Bank/Wealth Management
